evidence.source_document: Application to Stay the Judgment of the United States District Court for the District of Maryland and Request for Administrative Stay
evidence.text: Then-Judge Kavanaugh accordingly included the CPSC (along with the NLRB and MSPB) in a list of “agencies exercising substantial executive authority.”
Signed by Judge Matthew J. Maddox on 5/23/2025.
Enter the direction of Judge Heytens with the concurrence of Judge Gregory and Judge Wynn.
Enter the direction of Judge Heytens with the concurrence of Judge Gregory and Judge Wynn.
Enter the direction of Judge Heytens with the concurrence of Judge Gregory and Judge Wynn.
